metadata.description: We build a cozy multilingual chat space for day-one friends and far-away family.

About.title: About Goguma Chat
About.description: We‚Äôre obsessed with making conversations feel close, even across oceans.

paragraphs.craft: Goguma started as a side project so our Seoul, Tokyo, and LA friend groups could hang out in one place. We leaned into high-contrast UI so photos, stickers, and handwriting pop no matter your screen.
paragraphs.orchestration: Translation layers, shared playlists, and memory reels are woven in so you can glide between Korean, Japanese, and English without breaking the flow.
paragraphs.mission: We‚Äôre a tiny distributed crew who care about warmth more than vanity metrics. Mission: help people feel close, keep communities kind, and give everyone a place to talk after midnight.
